bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Climatic Condition identical with shu 暑② , summerheat. Huai nan hong lie jie Miscellaneous contents. Western Han 淮南鴻烈解; Huai era, 179~122 BCE. nan zi 4: 暑氣多夭 , 寒氣多 壽 , “Much summerheat qi entails early death; much cold qi entails long life”.

② Etiological Agent. identical with shu 暑③ , summerheat. Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 2 Recipe Entry si ni tang 四逆湯 , decoction for counterflow in the four [limbs]: 常服消暑氣 , 分水穀 , “If regularly ingested it will dissolve summerheat qi , and divide liquid [lit. “water”] and solid [lit. “grain”] food”.
